column5: My son-in-law and grandson want to take me up to Little Vermilion Lake north out of Red Lake Ont.I was wondering if any of you folks have been there and what your experience has been.Thankslen in mi.
FISHED LITTLE VERMILION IN THE LATE 80S.GOOD PIKE LAKE MANY BIG PIKE HAVE COME OUT OF THIS LAKE.DO NOT KNOW ABOUT FISHING IN THE LAKE ANYMORE SORRY.IS A NICE CAMP BRETS A GOOD GUY.
